Class FixFloatFundingInstrument

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.api.FixFloatFundingInstrument

  • public class FixFloatFundingInstrument
extends java.lang.Object
    FixFloatFundingInstrument contains the Fix Float Instrument Inputs for the Funding Curve Construction Purposes.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
